## Typedefs

### IndexWriteCallback {#a8dfcd0c2c963dcc17b900f0a7876f6b4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::lto::IndexWriteCallback =  std::function&lt;void(const std::string &amp;)&gt;</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h/#l00200">200</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h">LTO.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ThinBackendFunction {#aefd057e726ed7c74b8765a1934a5fa7c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::lto::ThinBackendFunction =  std::function&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ThinBackendProc&gt;(
    const Config &amp;C, ModuleSummaryIndex &amp;CombinedIndex,
    const DenseMap&lt;StringRef, GVSummaryMapTy&gt; &amp;ModuleToDefinedGVSummaries,
    AddStreamFn AddStream, FileCache Cache)&gt;</>}>
This callable defines the behavior of a ThinLTO backend after the thin-link phase.

It accepts a configuration <code>C</code>, a combined module summary index <code>CombinedIndex</code>, a map of module identifiers to global variable summaries <code>ModuleToDefinedGVSummaries</code>, a function to add output streams <code>AddStream</code>, and a file cache <code>Cache</code>. It returns a unique pointer to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/thinbackendproc">ThinBackendProc</a>, which can be used to launch backends in parallel.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h/#l00253">253</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h">LTO.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### backend() {#a89ef034c1f3a70da2446c1af1d656dab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::lto::backend (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config">Config</a> &amp; C, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aeb8b31be7b2c7dd67496051d7f952e94">AddStreamFn</a> AddStream, unsigned ParallelCodeGenParallelismLevel, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulesummaryindex">ModuleSummaryIndex</a> &amp; CombinedIndex)</>}>
Runs a regular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/lto">LTO</a> backend.

The regular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/lto">LTO</a> backend can also act as the regular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/lto">LTO</a> phase of ThinLTO, which may need to access the combined index.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/ltobackend-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/ltobackend-h">LTOBackend.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/ltobackend-cpp/#l00540">540</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/ltobackend-cpp">LTOBackend.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createInProcessThinBackend() {#a0ba26df9bcc2be206bc7c3d77162c665}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ThinBackend llvm::lto::createInProcessThinBackend (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy">ThreadPoolStrategy</a> Parallelism, <a href="#a8dfcd0c2c963dcc17b900f0a7876f6b4">IndexWriteCallback</a> OnWrite=nullptr, bool ShouldEmitIndexFiles=false, bool ShouldEmitImportsFiles=false)</>}>
This <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/thinbackend">ThinBackend</a> runs the individual backend jobs in-process.

The default value means to use one job per hardware core (not hyper-thread). OnWrite is callback which receives module identifier and notifies <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/lto">LTO</a> user that index file for the module (and optionally imports file) was created. ShouldEmitIndexFiles being true will write sharded ThinLTO index files to the same path as the input module, with suffix &quot;.thinlto.bc&quot; ShouldEmitImportsFiles is true it also writes a list of imported files to a similar path with &quot;.imports&quot; appended instead.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h/#l00292">292</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h">LTO.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/lto-cpp/#l01705">1705</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/lto-cpp">LTO.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createWriteIndexesThinBackend() {#ab71d9a6e89351ab0ad64e64a4e96f4f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ThinBackend llvm::lto::createWriteIndexesThinBackend (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy">ThreadPoolStrategy</a> Parallelism, std::string OldPrefix, std::string NewPrefix, std::string NativeObjectPrefix, bool ShouldEmitImportsFiles, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-fd-ostream">raw&#95;fd&#95;ostream</a> &#42; LinkedObjectsFile, <a href="#a8dfcd0c2c963dcc17b900f0a7876f6b4">IndexWriteCallback</a> OnWrite)</>}>
This <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/thinbackend">ThinBackend</a> writes individual module indexes to files, instead of running the individual backend jobs.

This backend is for distributed builds where separate processes will invoke the real backends.

To find the path to write the index to, the backend checks if the path has a prefix of OldPrefix; if so, it replaces that prefix with NewPrefix. It then appends &quot;.thinlto.bc&quot; and writes the index to that path. If ShouldEmitImportsFiles is true it also writes a list of imported files to a similar path with &quot;.imports&quot; appended instead. LinkedObjectsFile is an output stream to write the list of object files for the final ThinLTO linking. Can be nullptr. If LinkedObjectsFile is not nullptr and NativeObjectPrefix is not empty then it replaces the prefix of the objects with NativeObjectPrefix instead of NewPrefix. OnWrite is callback which receives module identifier and notifies <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/lto">LTO</a> user that index file for the module (and optionally imports file) was created.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h/#l00312">312</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h">LTO.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/lto-cpp/#l01825">1825</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/lto-cpp">LTO.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getThinLTODefaultCPU() {#a7d269a83a714b7924ac1d67e52655c73}

### getThinLTOOutputFile() {#a18eabcf596deec54ada617114b818baf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::string llvm::lto::getThinLTOOutputFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Path, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> OldPrefix, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NewPrefix)</>}>
Given the original <code>Path</code> to an output file, replace any path prefix matching <code>OldPrefix</code> with <code>NewPrefix</code>.

Also, create the resulting directory if it does not yet exist.

### thinBackend() {#ae6ff75e89240b2f2c01d3be088ca6014}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::lto::thinBackend (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config">Config</a> &amp; C, unsigned Task, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aeb8b31be7b2c7dd67496051d7f952e94">AddStreamFn</a> AddStream, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulesummaryindex">ModuleSummaryIndex</a> &amp; CombinedIndex, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionimporter/importmapty">FunctionImporter::ImportMapTy</a> &amp; ImportList, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a31671124e718a9212f15c19ac1e62515">GVSummaryMapTy</a> &amp; DefinedGlobals, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitcodemodule">BitcodeModule</a> &gt; &#42; ModuleMap, bool CodeGenOnly, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aeb8b31be7b2c7dd67496051d7f952e94">AddStreamFn</a> IRAddStream=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::vector&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; &amp; CmdArgs=std::vector&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt;())</>}>
Runs a ThinLTO backend.

If <code>ModuleMap</code> is not nullptr, all the module files to be imported have already been mapped to memory and the corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitcodemodule">BitcodeModule</a> objects are saved in the ModuleMap. If <code>ModuleMap</code> is nullptr, module files will be mapped to memory on demand and at any given time during importing, only one source module will be kept open at the most. If <code>CodeGenOnly</code> is true, the backend will skip optimization and only perform code generation. If <code>IRAddStream</code> is not nullptr, it will be called just before code generation to serialize the optimized IR.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/ltobackend-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/ltobackend-h">LTOBackend.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/ltobackend-cpp/#l00587">587</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/ltobackend-cpp">LTOBackend.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
